name: linq-ds/tailwind
description: LINQs official design tokens, Tailwind preset, and branded assets.
author: LINQ

scripts.fresh: rm -rf public && mkdir public && mkdir public/assets
scripts.copy: cp -r src/assets/fonts public/assets/fonts && cp -r src/assets/img public/assets/img && cp -r src/assets/css public/assets/css && cp -r src/assets/svg public/assets/svg
scripts.dev: npm run clean && npm run copy && npm run eleventy & npm run tailwind
scripts.build2: ELEVENTY_PRODUCTION=true eleventy & NODE_ENV=production postcss build src/assets/css/tailwind.css -o public/assets/css/tailwind.css
scripts.build: npm run clean && mkdir dist && npm run copy:root && npm run copy:base
